did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physdesc: This collection consists of one small notebook.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: New Market Climate Data, Collection #3067, Special Collections, Carrier Library, James Madison University, Harrisonburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Purchased from Bookworm and Silverfish Bookdealers in Sept. 1995. Mr. Jim Presgraves, bookdealer, identified this notebook as one of his purchases from an auction of Rupp family items in 1994.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Bookdealer acquired this from the Rupp family. The Rupps were a New Market, VA family, and he penciled "New Market VA" and "Rupp" on the cover.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: temperature and occasional other details of weather are recorded at irregular intervals from 1902 to 1920. There is no identification.
